Title: toDateTime64OrZero
Description: Like toDateTime64, this function converts an input value to a value of type DateTime64 but returns the min value of DateTime64 if an invalid argument is received.
expr — The value. String, UInt32, Float or DateTime.scale - Tick size (precision): 10-precision seconds. Valid range: [ 0 : 9 ].timezone (optional) - Time zone of the specified DateTime64 object.
A calendar date and time of day, with sub-second precision, otherwise the minimum value of DateTime64: 1970-01-01 01:00:00.000. DateTime64.
